com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.datalink.bluetooth

Class BluetoothAdHocManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.datalink.bluetooth.BluetoothAdHocManager

  • public class BluetoothAdHocManager
extends java.lang.Object

    This class manages the Bluetooth discovery and the pairing with other bluetooth devices.
